title: Beautiful 1 Bed 1 Bath in Amazing Neighborhood! Available NOW!
posting_body: Your adventure starts here-welcome to The Markham apartments in Cupertino.
The Markham Apartments currently has a one-bedroom, one-bathroom residence for lease.
This home provides a stainless steel appliance package for convenience in meal preparation.
Individuals can easily clean spills and stains from granite countertops.
The in-house washer and dryer eliminate the need to wash clothes elsewhere.
With ample space in each closet, individuals gain storage options for personal belongings.
This apartment even comes with a deck, perfect for relaxation or recreation.
Everyone can look forward to a variety of activities at the clubhouse and the business center.
Individuals can also exercise in the twenty-four-hour fitness center, and then spend a restful afternoon at the hydrotherapy spa.
Neighbors are never far from Facebook with free Wi-Fi in the common areas.
Contact the leasing office to learn more.
A neighbor ambassador would love to help with scheduling a tour or providing current apartment pricing and availability quotes.
Call for details: pricing/availability subject to change at any time.
